title: Rogue Network
text:
Limit 1 hosted tag.
Whenever you take a tag, you may host it on this resource. (The tag is not considered active.)
You may remove hosted tags as if they were yours.
The Corp may trash this resource with the basic action while it is hosting a tag.
[trash], hosted tag: Take 1 tag. Choose 1 installed Corp card. Until your next turn begins, it costs 1[credit] more to rez for each tag you have at that time.
